ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe, A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
"Reinstated" Part 4 (of 4)
Destro unleashes the nano-mites on America and chaos ensues. All communication from Washington DC has been cut off, and the Joes must go in blind. This issue wraps up the story arc that brought G.I.JOE back to comics and lays the foundation for many more stories to come. Perhaps the most action packed issue yet, the Joes' battle with Cobra takes them right up to the white house lawn! Yo Joe! Recommended for readers and fans of G.I.Joe is a sure win with anyone into high adventure, military action, and more. It's an action story that plots the U.S. military against a team of near-super villains, and a great nostalgia kick to boot.
ComicInfo.Title: Reinstated! 4 of 4
